name: Worn Sleekblaster Minor
raw:
</font><font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
 'Worn Sleekblaster Minor'
The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level  81 and  100.
All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
Add them using shift+right-click.
 Add in following order:

 1. Energy Weapons Construction kit. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400

 2. Jandawit Cleanup Cluster. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  284 ->  350

 3. Short Composite Barrel. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  263 ->  325

 4. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250

 5. Energy Conduction Rack. SkillTo Assemble: Quantum FT:  263 ->  325

 6. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 2x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  162 ->  200

 7. Flake Tubing Base Cooling System. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400

 8. Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400

 9. Energy Pack Interface. SkillTo Assemble: Elec. Engi:  324 ->  400

 10. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  122 ->  150
